content: this legal text summarizes a court case in the family court of henegouwen the court rejected the exwifes objection to the notarys liquidation statement the court criticized the exwife for including damages in the statement without providing information about the procedure she initiated to evict the exhusband from the undivided property it is unclear if the exwife ever took action to make the exhusband pay for the damage caused the court considered the exwifes objection and the experts assessment of the damage the court also addressed the exspouses objection regarding the accounts made for the damages stating that the notary is responsible for carrying out the accounts according to the civil code the court concluded that the exwife should take appropriate legal action to seek compensation for the damage caused
